sub_013_coin_back_01:
Lately, I’ve found a coin or two lying around.
Perhaps folks have more than they can hold onto.
sub_013_coin_back_02:
I picked up a coin while I was cleaning. Had a
feeling it was yours—here you go.
sub_013_coin_back_03:
I picked up some coins while I was cleaning.
Had a feeling they were yours—here you go.
